remarks: If ` S ` lies on ` P Q ` , then ` P Q = P S ` .  Theorem 6.16 of [Schwabhauser] p. 45.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: lineelsb2 $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( P e. ( EE ` N ) /\ Q e. ( EE ` N ) /\ P =/= Q ) /\ ( S e. ( EE ` N ) /\ P =/= S ) ) -> ( S e. ( P Line Q ) -> ( P Line Q ) = ( P Line S ) ) ) $.
